entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:43 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -37.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 10:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -37.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -41.0°C
Wind: NW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few clouds. High minus 32.
